item.title: Riot Promotes Strategy Chief Jason Chung To CFO Role
item.description: RIOT stock rises after appointing new CFO Jason Chung effective 2026. Current CFO Colin Yee will stay as senior advisor. read more

item.title: Alaska Air Bets $600 Million On Hawaiian Airlines To Redefine Island Travel
